column1: You just couldn't let it go!
I'm afraid we can't do that, Wendy!
Bebe?! Who do you think authorized the buyout?!
She's dating Clyde now. Nobody loves shoes more than her.
Do you really think they'll believe you over the heads of the committee?! We'll simple generate a new list! "Biggest Liars"! And put you at the top!
Hey. Wait.  Look, I'm sorry. That was mean. I'd love to try one of your mom's cupcakes.
Yeah, I'm fine, I just- Awwgh!  M-Mr. Garrison? Can I please  be excused?
Gah I just need to go to the restroom!
No, Mr. Garrison, I've gotta- go- AAAH!
Guess he has a crush on Nichole.
How, we wanna play wit' youuuu.
It flies around and it's endangered.
And you must be Stan's sister. Oh, I think your brother's the greatest.
